ends We’re building a world where everyone has the power to shape their lives. Become a member of the coalition

With indigenous people SDG 12 Responsible consumption and production Become a member of the coalition
 Become a volunteer
With youth, children, women and vulnerable people SDG 16 Peace, justice and strong institutions Become a member of the coalition
 Become a volunteer
With refugees, women and vulnerable people SDG 3 Good health and well-being Become a member of the coalition
 Become a volunteer
 SDG 5 Gender equality Become a member of the coalition
QUI NOUS SOMMES

Un réseau africain renforçant les objectifs de développement durable et la consolidation de la paix par les jeunes

NOUS AGISSONS POUR LA PAIX ET LE DÉVELOPPEMENT DURABLE

MAKE A DONATION

Contribute financially to help us support the achievement of the SDGs in Africa.

ACCESS OUR TV SHOW

Understanding the realities of the SDGs at local, community and regional levels.

ND4NP COALITION

The New Deal seeks to protect and restore nature for the benefit of people and planet.

ACCESS OUR FORUM

Give your view to raise up your voice in Africa. No one is left behind.

NOS ACCRÉDITATIONS

Statut consultatif spécial auprès du Conseil économique et social des Nations Unies (ECOSOC).

Accrédité par la Convention des Nations Unies sur la lutte contre la désertification (UNCCD).

Accrédité dans le cadre du Global Compact for Safe, Orderly and Regular Migration.

Accrédité par les Nations Unies pour l’environnement (PNUE).

Convention-cadre des Nations unies sur les changements climatiques (CCNUCC).

QUI NOUS SOMMES

Pourquoi la consolidation de la paix des jeunes et le développement durable ?

Aider la communauté…

Les jeunes ne sont pas seulement l’avenir, ils sont le présent. Aujourd’hui, plus de la moitié de la population africaine a moins de 35 ans. En offrant aux jeunes la possibilité de façonner leur avenir; Le peut devenir l’acteur majeur de la construction de la paix pour atteindre les objectifs de développement durable. Pour en savoir plus, vous pouvez lire notre vision et nos activités.

COMMENT NOUS AIDONS

Nous agissons pour la paix et le développement durable

NOTRE MISSION
NOTRE VISION
NOTRE PHILOSOPHIE
NOS PROGRAMMES

ANYL4PSD is a platform based on the principles of voluntary service, solidarity, the common good and human dignity.

We focus on sources of inspiration and the potential of cultural, natural and human resources, including youth, to identify pathways for concrete actions to build peace, understood as the cornerstone of endogenous and sustainable development.

Learn More

YOUTHS PEACEBUILDING AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT

To contribute decisively to the emergence of the youth class, its positioning and its effective participation in public policies

Learn More

We act for peace and sustainable development

Our philosophy is to broaden public space for more economic, social, cultural and political expression in order to develop a critical mass of young Africans with major skills in social co-operation and public participation
Learn More

We help people reduce their poverty by a huge number

Provide exceptional healthcare, foods & funds to support victims in natural or pandemic disaster, war, …

Offer free of charge, high quality medical treatment and surgical care for people.

Learn More

Nos programmes

Connecter les gens aux ODD

Afin de renforcer la participation et l'implication individuelles et multi-acteurs
APPRENDRE ENCORE PLUS

Enfants pour la paix

Les enfants grandissent à une époque d'interconnexion et d'innovation mondiale sans précédent
APPRENDRE ENCORE PLUS
PLUS DE PROGRAMMES

Programme Genre, santé reproductive et nutrition

Ambassadeurs

L'ÉDUCATION EST UN DROIT FONDAMENTAL ET LE FONDEMENT DU PROGRÈS DANS TOUS LES PAYS.

Toute personne a droit à l'éducation quelle que soit sa couleur de peau, son origine et sa culture.

L’éducation est l’une des clés du développement. Les pays qui réussissent dépendent d’une main-d’œuvre qualifiée et instruite pour faire face aux défis auxquels ils sont confrontés.

REJOIGNEZ NOTRE UNIVERSITÉ EN LIGNE
DE NOTRE BLOG

Dernières nouvelles

En plus de notre impact continu en Afrique

25 July 202225 July 2022

Overview of Serious and Organised crime in West Africa

Transnational organized crime in West Africa is a persistent threat. As a result, INTERPOL, under the European Union funded ENACT Project, has sought to catalogue and assess organized crime in the region in order to […]
AnYl4Psd 0 Comments
25 July 202225 July 2022

Overview of Organized crime in Africa

International criminal organizations continue to target Africa because of the significant illicit wealth that can be generated, stemming from criminal market opportunities that exploit various social and political vulnerabilities, state fragility, and limited policing capacities […]
AnYl4Psd 0 Comments
15 October 202115 October 2021

Impact of Climate Change on Major Staple Food Crops and Farmers’ Adaptation Strategies in Atacora.

INTRODUCTION Agriculture is the biggest single industry in many developing countries of the world. Benin is a West African country in which agriculture plays an important economic role. The agricultural sector employs about 70% of […]
